page.title: 07West Buckland Garage
page.content: Mr.Adams has owned the garage for 4 years.He has lived in Landkey all his life.He always wanted to own a garage.He has to travel 4 miles to work every day.The garage sells petrol and repairs cars sells a few second hand cars.He is in favour of the new link road because it will probably bring more customers. He would like to move to Canada because he likes the countryside out there. He works 10 hours 6 days a week but always has Sunday off,when he likes to watch motor racing. He repairs 3-4 cars a day,about 80 a month.His ambition is to make the garage very profitable and build his own house with a swimming pool.He says if he was not in the garage business there is nothing else he would want to do.
